page.syntax: Result_Flag as L = UI_BITMAP_CREATE_FROM_SCREEN(C name,N x,N y,N width,N height)

argument.name: name
argument.description: The name of the bitmap to create.

argument.name: x
argument.description: The horizontal coordinate of the upper left corner of the image.

argument.name: y
argument.description: The vertical coordinate of the upper left corner of the image.

argument.name: width
argument.description: The width of the image to capture.

argument.name: height
argument.description: The height of the image to capture.

page.description: Create a bitmap from a rectangle on screen.
page.discussion: UI_BITMAP_CREATE_FROM_SCREEN() creates a bitmap from the screen. All measurements are in inches.

section.description: The following example captured a 4 by 2 inch rectangle from the upper left corner of the Code Editor.
